summary: Misplaced nosideeffects annotations in jquery externs

comments.content:
The definitions for the following functions shouldn't have the @nosideeffects annotation, because passing values to them changes properties of DOM elements. They shouldn't be eliminated by the compiler.

jQueryObject.prototype.height
jQueryObject.prototype.offset
jQueryObject.prototype.width

This applies to all jQuery externs incl. jquery-1.5.

Anybody have time for a quick review?
http://codereview.appspot.com/4195044/
This issue was closed by r806.
